CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL(Billing__c, "Time & Materials"), IF(Total_Billable_Hours_Remaining__c = 0, "Est Billable Hours match Actual Billable Hours", IMAGE( "/servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=" &IF( Total_Billable_Hours_Remaining__c < 0 , "01550000000IHVt","01550000000IHW9"),"")), "No billable hours - Fixed Bid")
CustomField.label: Billable Hours Status
